data.message: Hello, your Explorer function is the worst facebook function ever. It is not working at all. Maximum news i ever had in Explorer was 3!!! I can't find content from my liked pages, thnaks to Explorer function. PLEASE remove that, it is pure evil.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Wendy. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2yXjO0o. -Tenaya
